title: Theme Stated
description: A character states the main theme.

title: Set-Up
description: Establish character behaviors. Introduce running gags and call-backs.

title: Fun and Games
description: What the premise promises. Trailer moments. Training montages.

title: All Is Lost
description: The hero appears to be defeated.

title: Dark Night of the Soul
description: Soul-searching. The darkness before the dawn.

title: Finale
description: Apply the lessons learned. Character quirks become sources of strength. Defeat the bad guys.

title: Final Image
description: The opposite of the opening image. Character growth.
